test_cases.objective: Verify that the sample login screens are correctly configured to capture site-specific attributes as per URS-LIMS-004.
prerequisites: Test user with Analyst role created

test_steps.action: Log in to the LIMS system as an Analyst.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the sample login screen.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the sample login screen and attempt to register a new sample.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample login screen displays all required fields: Batch number, Manufacturing date, Expiry date, and Storage conditions.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid batch number (alphanumeric, 10 characters) and verify the input.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts the batch number and validates the format.

test_steps.action: Select a product from the master data and verify the expiry date calculation.
test_steps.expected_result: Expiry date is automatically calculated based on the product master data.

acceptance_criteria: All required fields are present and correctly labeled.
Batch number input is validated for format and length.
Expiry date is correctly calculated based on product master data.
Storage conditions dropdown contains all specified options.
data_integrity_requirements: All entered data must be accurately captured and stored.
Audit trail must record all changes to sample data.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the LIMS system correctly integrates with the existing SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter as per URS-LIMS-003.
prerequisites: SAP ERP system available and configured for integration
Vendor's standard adapter installed and configured

test_steps.action: Log in to the LIMS system as an Analyst.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the integration settings.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the integration settings and verify the SAP ERP connection status.
test_steps.expected_result: System displays a successful connection status to SAP ERP.

test_steps.action: Create a test sample in LIMS and verify the data is synced to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample data is successfully transmitted to SAP ERP and appears in the ERP system.

test_steps.action: Modify the sample data in SAP ERP and verify the change is reflected in LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Modified data is successfully synced back to LIMS.

acceptance_criteria: LIMS establishes a successful connection to SAP ERP.
Sample data is accurately transmitted between LIMS and SAP ERP.
Changes made in SAP ERP are correctly reflected in LIMS.
Integration errors are logged and reported.
data_integrity_requirements: All transmitted data must be accurate and complete.
Audit trail must record all data exchanges between systems.

test_cases.test_name: Integration of LIMS with SAP ERP via Vendor Adapter
test_cases.objective: Verify the successful integration of the LIMS with the existing SAP ERP system using the vendor's standard adapter.

test_steps.action: Initiate a sample data transfer from LIMS to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transferred to SAP ERP without errors.

test_steps.action: Verify the received data in SAP ERP matches the sent data from LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data in SAP ERP is accurate and matches the LIMS data.

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer completes successfully
Data integrity is maintained
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurate and complete
Audit trail must be maintained

test_cases.objective: Ensure the LIMS is correctly configured to manage stability study protocols using the vendor's configuration tools.

test_steps.action: Configure a stability study protocol in LIMS using the vendor's tools.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully configured and saved in LIMS.

test_steps.action: Initiate a stability study using the configured protocol.
test_steps.expected_result: Stability study is initiated and progresses according to the protocol.

acceptance_criteria: Protocol is correctly configured
Stability study progresses as expected
data_integrity_requirements: Protocol data must be accurate
Audit trail must be maintained

test_cases.objective: Verify that the sample login screen is correctly configured to capture site-specific attributes as per URS-LIMS-004.
prerequisites: User with Analyst role logged in

test_steps.action: Navigate to the sample login screen in the LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample login screen is displayed with all configured fields visible.
data_to_capture: Screenshot of the sample login screen

test_steps.action: Enter a sample batch number (alphanumeric, 10 characters).
test_steps.expected_result: Batch number is accepted and displayed correctly.

test_steps.action: Select a manufacturing date from the calendar widget.
test_steps.expected_result: Manufacturing date is recorded and displayed correctly.

test_steps.action: Verify the expiry date is auto-calculated based on product master data.
test_steps.expected_result: Expiry date is calculated and displayed correctly.

test_steps.action: Select a storage condition from the dropdown menu.
test_steps.expected_result: Selected storage condition is recorded and displayed correctly.

acceptance_criteria: All configured fields are present and functional.
Batch number, manufacturing date, expiry date, and storage conditions are captured correctly.
data_integrity_requirements: All entered data must be accurately recorded and stored.
Audit trail must capture all changes to sample data.

test_cases.objective: Verify that stability study protocols are correctly configured using the vendor's configuration tools as per URS-LIMS-005.
prerequisites: User with Reviewer role logged in

test_steps.action: Navigate to the stability study configuration module in the LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Stability study configuration module is displayed.
data_to_capture: Screenshot of the stability study configuration module

test_steps.action: Select a predefined stability study protocol from the list.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol details are displayed correctly.

test_steps.action: Verify the protocol includes all required parameters (e.g., temperature, humidity, time points).
test_steps.expected_result: All parameters are present and correctly configured.
data_to_capture: List of parameters and their values

test_steps.action: Modify a parameter (e.g., change a time point) and save the changes.
test_steps.expected_result: Changes are saved and reflected in the protocol.
data_to_capture: Modified parameter and its new value

test_steps.action: Review the audit trail for the modified protocol.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail shows the change with timestamp and user details.
data_to_capture: Audit trail entry for the modification

acceptance_criteria: Stability study protocols are correctly configured and modifiable.
Audit trail captures all changes to protocols.
data_integrity_requirements: All protocol modifications must be accurately recorded.
Audit trail must be complete and tamper-evident.

test_cases.objective: Verify the successful integration of LIMS with SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter.

test_steps.action: Initiate a sample registration in LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample data should be transmitted to SAP ERP without errors.

acceptance_criteria: Data transmission confirmed by SAP ERP
No errors logged in LIMS
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data consistency between LIMS and SAP ERP

test_cases.objective: Ensure that electronic worksheets for 15 different analytical methods are correctly configured.

test_steps.action: Select an analytical method and initiate the electronic worksheet.
test_steps.expected_result: Worksheet should display all required fields and calculations correctly.

acceptance_criteria: All fields and calculations verified
No discrepancies found
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure accurate data capture and calculations

test_cases.objective: Verify the integration between LIMS and SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter to ensure seamless data exchange.
prerequisites: LIMS and SAP ERP systems are operational
Vendor's standard adapter is installed and configured

test_steps.action: Initiate a sample registration in LIMS with SAP ERP integration enabled.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample data is successfully transmitted to SAP ERP without errors.

acceptance_criteria: Sample data is accurately reflected in SAP ERP
No transmission errors occur
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data consistency between LIMS and SAP ERP

test_cases.objective: Validate that the LIMS can handle a sample throughput of 500 samples per day as specified in the URS.
prerequisites: Sample data is prepared for testing

test_steps.action: Load 500 samples into the LIMS system.
test_steps.expected_result: All samples are processed within the expected timeframe without system errors.

acceptance_criteria: All 500 samples are processed within 24 hours
System performance metrics are within acceptable limits
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all sample data is accurately recorded

test_cases.test_name: Integration with SAP ERP via Vendor Adapter
test_cases.objective: Verify the LIMS system successfully integrates with SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter.

test_steps.action: Initiate a sample data transfer from LIMS to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transferred to SAP ERP without errors.

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer completes within expected time frame
No errors in transfer logs
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transfer
Verify data accuracy post-transfer

test_cases.objective: Ensure the LIMS system supports concurrent use by 50 users without performance degradation.

test_steps.action: Simulate 50 users logging in and performing sample registration tasks.
test_steps.expected_result: System handles all users without significant performance issues.

acceptance_criteria: All users can perform tasks without errors
System response times remain within acceptable limits
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data consistency across all user sessions

test_cases.test_name: Integration Test: LIMS-SAP ERP Data Exchange
test_cases.objective: Verify the successful configuration and operation of the LIMS-SAP ERP interface using the vendor's standard adapter.

test_steps.action: Log into LIMS and navigate to the SAP ERP interface configuration.
test_steps.expected_result: Interface configuration screen is displayed with all required fields.

test_steps.action: Send a test sample data from LIMS to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample data is successfully transmitted and received by SAP ERP.

acceptance_criteria: Data transmission is successful without errors.
Received data matches sent data.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission.
Verify data accuracy post-transmission.

test_cases.test_name: Functional Test: Stability Study Protocol Configuration
test_cases.objective: Validate the configuration of stability study protocols using the vendor's configuration tools.

test_steps.action: Access the stability study protocol configuration module in LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Configuration module is accessible with all required fields.

test_steps.action: Configure a stability study protocol and save the configuration.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully saved and can be retrieved.

acceptance_criteria: Protocol configuration is saved without errors.
Configured protocol matches the defined requirements.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure protocol data integrity during configuration.
Verify protocol accuracy post-configuration.

test_cases.test_name: Integration with SAP ERP via Standard Adapter
test_cases.objective: Verify successful data exchange between LIMS and SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter.
prerequisites: LIMS system is installed and configured
Vendor's standard adapter is installed and configured

test_steps.action: Log in to LIMS with appropriate credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in to LIMS.

test_steps.action: Create a test sample in LIMS with required attributes.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample is successfully created in LIMS.

test_steps.action: Verify the sample data is transmitted to SAP ERP via the adapter.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample data appears in SAP ERP within expected time frame.

acceptance_criteria: Sample data is accurately transmitted to SAP ERP
Transmission occurs within 5 minutes of sample creation
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be complete, consistent, and accurate during transmission
Audit trail must record all data exchange events

test_cases.objective: Verify that stability study protocols can be correctly configured using vendor's tools.
prerequisites: LIMS system is installed and configured

test_steps.action: Access stability study configuration module in LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Configuration module is accessible with appropriate permissions.

test_steps.action: Configure a stability study protocol according to site SOPs.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol is successfully saved in LIMS.

test_steps.action: Verify protocol parameters match SOP requirements.
test_steps.expected_result: All configured parameters align with documented SOPs.

acceptance_criteria: Protocol can be successfully configured and saved
All required parameters are available for configuration
Configured parameters match SOP requirements
data_integrity_requirements: Configuration changes must be recorded in audit trail
Protocol parameters must be locked after QA approval

test_cases.objective: Verify the successful integration of LIMS with SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter.

test_steps.action: Initiate data transfer from LIMS to SAP ERP
test_steps.expected_result: Data transfer completes without errors

test_steps.action: Verify data consistency between LIMS and SAP ERP
test_steps.expected_result: Data in SAP ERP matches the data sent from LIMS

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer completes successfully
Data consistency verified
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transfer
Verify data consistency

test_cases.objective: Ensure the LIMS system can handle the required sample throughput of 500 samples per day.

test_steps.action: Load 500 sample records into LIMS
test_steps.expected_result: All samples are successfully registered

test_steps.action: Execute sample processing workflows
test_steps.expected_result: All samples are processed within expected timeframes

acceptance_criteria: All samples registered successfully
Processing times within acceptable limits
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure accurate sample registration
Verify processing times

test_cases.test_name: Verify LIMS Sample Login Screen Configuration
test_cases.objective: To verify that the sample login screen is correctly configured to capture site-specific attributes as per URS-LIMS-004.
prerequisites: LIMS system is installed and operational
Sample login screen configuration is completed

test_steps.action: Access the sample login screen in LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample login screen is displayed with fields for batch number, manufacturing date, expiry date, and storage conditions.

test_steps.action: Enter sample data including batch number, manufacturing date, and select storage conditions.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is accepted and stored correctly in the system.

acceptance_criteria: All fields are present and correctly labeled
Data is stored accurately
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data entered is accurately stored and retrievable

test_cases.test_name: Validate LIMS Integration with SAP ERP
test_cases.objective: To validate the integration between LIMS and SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter as per URS-LIMS-003.
prerequisites: LIMS and SAP ERP systems are operational

test_steps.action: Send a test data set from LIMS to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted and received by SAP ERP.

test_steps.action: Verify the data in SAP ERP matches the data sent from LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data in SAP ERP is identical to the data sent from LIMS.

acceptance_criteria: Data transmission is successful
Data integrity is maintained
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission
